ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex

Interface IVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEditItemObservable, IGraphItem, IRestrictedGraphItem, IRestrictedVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GravisVertex

    public interface IVertex
extends IGraphItem, IRestrictedVertex
    This interface gives access to additional vertex methods.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)

    • Method Summary

      • getCurrentDrawColor

        Color getCurrentDrawColor()
        Returns the current draw color of this vertex.
        Returns:
        draw color

      • setCurrentDrawColor

        void setCurrentDrawColor(Color color)
        Sets the current draw color of this vertex.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if color is null

      • setEnd

        void setEnd(boolean end)
        Sets as end vertex. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.END_EDITED is fired if end is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        end -

      • setHeight

        void setHeight(double height)
        Sets the height of this vertex. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.VISUAL_EDITED is fired if height is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        height -

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(Point2D location)
        Sets the location of this vertex. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.VISUAL_EDITED is fired if location is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        location -
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if location is null

      • setStart

        void setStart(boolean start)
        Sets as start vertex. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.START_EDITED is fired if start is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        start -

      • setWidth

        void setWidth(double width)
        Sets the width of this vertex. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.VISUAL_EDITED is fired if width is different from the existing value.
        Parameters:
        width -
